The Grunt.js file shipped with the NPM, Bower and source download has two tasks. The default task ( grunt ) has the following subtasks:

  • grunt-contrib-clean
  • grunt-contrib-sass
  • grunt-autoprefixer
  • grunt-stripcomments
  • grunt-contrib-watch

If you only want to build, and not watch, use grunt dist. Both tasks produce the following files in the dist folder:
